column9: A brief description of the natural wastewater systems used to handle the institution’s wastewater
column10: The website URL where information about the institution’s wastewater management practices is ...

column11: Total wastewater discharged is calculated for the 2013 fiscal year to keep it consistent with  and comparable to total water used.
Our total waste water discharged is equal to the amount of purchased (potable water) less the amount that went into our closed loop Chiller Plant.

column9: Greywater from the Macoskey Center Harmony House is recovered and treated by a Wastewater Treatment Catchment System consisting of two separator tanks, and then reused via a distribution system that directs the waste water to an outdoor aquatic planting area and meadow.

column1: University of Texas Rio Grande Valley
